name: Angel Town 5- single player
description:
【Buy Once,Play Forever】
◆No Ads
◆No In App Purchase
◆Don't need to spend money in the game any more!
◆2022 New Indie Game

【Features】
◆SP,don't need the internet
◆Customize your team
◆Different angels fight for you
◆Highly accessible turn-based gameplay
◆Colorful, vivid HD graphics and animations
◆Original fantasy world
◆Easy to learn – jump right in and play
◆Fight until you reach the top of the standings

—————— Questions————————
【Q】 How can I modify the commander's name?
【A】 In your iOS, 【Settings】 - > 【GameCenter】.

【Q】 The IAP did not reach my account,what can I do?
【A】Please wait patiently.If the IAP can't reach your account in 24 hours, please contact us by crabsoft@hotmail.com.

【Q】 Why can't I see the ranking information?
【A】 Please login in GameCenter

—————————Feedback—————————
◆We'd love to get your feedback.
◆E-mail:crabsoft@hotmail.com
◆Twitter:@Crabsoft

Good luck!Have fun!(○^～^○)
